name: rotaflow
description: This group project is created and by the Freesytle Squad:  Felipe Hernandez, Kitty Pelerin, and Rastko Sassic of GA.  The name of our App is RotaFlow.  Rota is Latin for wheel or a  form of rotation or roster call, an overview, list of duties, or  in this case, wish items. RotaFlow is a fun, user-friendly,  organization app, which facilitates your wishes easier.
